references.paper_title: Trailing the dovetail shuffle to its lair
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational mathematical model for the riffle shuffle, which is crucial to the forward diffusion process in the proposed SymmetricDiffusers model.

references.paper_title: Group representations in probability and statistics
references.reason: This book is a seminal work in the field of random walks on finite groups, providing essential theoretical background for the design and analysis of the SymmetricDiffusers model.

This paper introduces fast differentiable sorting algorithms, which are closely related to the problem of learning permutation distributions and provide a crucial comparison point for the proposed method.
This paper introduces the foundation of denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which is fundamental to the overall framework of SymmetricDiffusers.
This book introduces the Plackett-Luce model, a fundamental probabilistic model for permutations, which the proposed model builds on and generalizes.
